name: Find The Truth (Nicolás B. Gómez)
description:
Find The Truth is an academic project developed by students from UPB Colombia.

In Find The Truth, you will play as Andrés, a little boy whose dog has been capture in Halloween's eve by evil scientists for some experiments, now he has to infiltrate their base and rescue him from their evil hands.

How to Play

Your objective is to escape each level and be stealthy in the process, you can hide and shoot guns to avoid this, good luck!

Controls

  • You can move with W, A, S, D.
  • You can jump with SPACE.
  • You can hide with S in the designated locations.
  • You can shoot your gun with LEFT CLICK.
Development Team
  • Idea: Nicolás Bernal Gómez, Maria José Ramirez López, Ana María Sosa.
  • Art and animations: Maria José Ramirez López, Ana María Sosa.
  • Developer and programmer: Nicolás Bernal Gómez.
